thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Thomas Modliba
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Thomas Modliba

author: Thomas Modliba
title: Thomas Modliba
text:
Already ordered a lot of goods via Banggood.
In comparison to other shops, they offer high quality gadgets, price is not always the absolute lowest, but they are very reliable in terms of shipping. Up to now, almost all orders were delivered within one month. For more costly items various shipping and insurance options are provided.
Highly recommended.
